text: Marjolein Decroix (born 17 March 1992) is a Belgian alpine skier, born in Poperinge. She competed in slalom at the 2018 Winter Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:People from Poperinge Category:Belgian female alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Belgium Category:Alpine skiers at the 2018 Winter Olympics
title: Marjolein Decroix
